prompt:
Describe an experience in which you learned something new and interesting about a city or town that you had never visited before.
I recently took a trip to New York City and discovered its thriving culinary scene. I tried various street foods, such as hot dogs, pretzels, and cotton candy. At night, I enjoyed the view of the glowing skyline from the Brooklyn Bridge. This experience made me appreciate the city's rich culture and history more deeply.
